channel.title: The Safehouse News
channel.description: The Rogue Community site for all your MMORPG news!!

item.title: Anime Expo News
item.description:
Anime Expo has proved once again to be the premier industry con each year. Many licenses manga and anime alike, announcements, etc. I will list all of the manga and anime that were licensed, and a description of most titles.

All in all, about 13 licenses this time around. Not a record, but still very high and a very good sign for the Anime industry as whole as it appears to be slowly crawling out of it's slump and finding moderation.

Read more for all the information!

item.title: Vanguard Artists Comment on New Targonor
item.description: Yesterday we released a nice set of screenshots featuring Vanguard's New Targonor. Today we got some nice commentary from the artists involved.

item.title: War Hammer Online Screens & Community Event?
item.description: Warhammer Online is moving right along and they've shared a trio of exclusive screenshots with us.

item.title: New Vanguard Screenshots
item.description: Several screenshots from Vanguard: New Targonor.

item.title: Electronic Arts to buy Mythic Entertainment
item.description:
Today Electronic Arts announced that it has entered into an agreement to buy Mythic Entertainment.  Mythic Entertainment will become EA Mythic, a wholely owned studio dedicated to developing Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Games.

The press release can be found in .pdf form here, or on Mythic Entertainment's website here.

item.title: World of Warcraft 1.11 Patch Notes
item.description:
World of Warcraft Client Patch 1.11.0

Shadow of the Necropolis

 

Floating above the Plaguelands, the necropolis known as Naxxramas serves as the seat of one of the Lich King's most powerful officers, the dreaded lich Kel'Thuzad. Horrors of the past and new terrors yet to be unleashed are gathering inside the necropolis as the Lich King's servants prepare their assault. The Scourge marches again...

item.title: Lore: Compiled HTML File Now Available
item.description:
While the scribes of Telon have been quiet as of late, we finally got Nocte to get The Safehouse Anthology of Telonian Lore in an offline portable html format.

This new format is a standard Windows *.CHM file replete with the contents, index, search, and favorites tabbed pages implemented.

item.title: Black Cat and Zipang announced at A-Kon
item.description:
During A-Kon in Dallas, TX, two new titles were announced to be licensed for USA release. The first title announced on Saturday was Black Cat by Funimation. The second title was announced on Sunday by Geneon, Zipang.

Read full story for more info on the titles.

item.title: Solo play arrives in Stormreach
item.description: DUNGEONS & DRAGONS ONLINE: Stormreach; delivers some of the most exciting game play experiences available in online gaming today. Turbine has received tremendous positive feedback on the launch of DDO. Feedback from new players has included the request for more solo-play content as an option to the already fun and challenging group-focused content throughout the game. Turbine has listened to this feedback and is pleased to announce the upcoming availability of solo-friendly content. An all new solo setting is being introduced to help new DDO players navigate through the early game content, allowing them the time and space to learn about their characters, try strategies and face monsters for the first time on their own. Players will now have the option to play at their own pace as a solo-player in the Harbor.

item.title: Issue 7 goes Live
item.description:
After much anticipation, today City of Heroes/Villains' seventh issue (titled 'Destiny Manifest') went live.

Destiny Manifest is a large free update which adds levels 41 to 50 for City of Villains characters, as well as a whole slew of updates including two new zones (a high end PvP zone named 'Recluse's Victory', an alternate reality of Atlas Park where villains and heroes fight for the fate of Paragon City, and Grandville, a high level City of Villains zone).

In addition, Issue 7 introduces new villain powersets (thugs for masterinds,  two electric based powersets for brutes, and two dark energy based powersets for stalkers), Patron Powers for villains over level 40, storage bins for bases, and support for Ageia PhysX cards (in Mayhem Missions only).

You can read the patch notes here.
